text: Frederik "Frits" Korthals Altes (15 May 1931 - 19 February 2025) was Dutch politician. He was a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD). He became Minister of State on 26 October 2001. Altes was Chairman of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy from 15 March 1975 until 22 May 1981. He was elected as a Member of the Senate, taking office on 10 June 1981. After the election of 1982, Altes was appointed as Minister of Justice, taking office on 4 November 1982. Altes died on 19 February 2025, at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mr. F. (Frits) Korthals Altes Parlement & Politiek * Mr. F. title: Frits Korthals Altes
